recipe.title: Bread and Tomato Soup
ingredients: 6 cups day-old white bread, without crusts, torn into small pieces
1 (28-ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, pureed with their juice
3 to 4 basil leaves, torn into small pieces
instructions: 1. Heat the oil in a large, deep saucepan over low heat. 2. Sauté the garlic until just fragrant, then add the bread, stirring until all the oil is absorbed and the bread is toasted. 3. Add the tomatoes, stock, basil, and salt. 4. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat. Simmer until the bread breaks down, about 20 minutes. Remove the garlic and serve.
